subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gene Keady, who retired from Purdue in 2005 after 27 seasons as a Division I head coach, will join the St. John’s staff as a special assistant/adviser, Coach Steve Lavin said.
snippet: Gene Keady, who retired from Purdue in 2005 after 27 seasons as a Division I head coach, will join the St. John’s staff as a special assistant/adviser, Coach Steve Lavin said.
